content:
The OmniScript Email Action uses the Salesforce Email API to either send an email template or a defined email body. 

If using a template, the "Use Template" checkbox is checked and:

* Select Email Template: The ID of the email template.
* Email Target Object ID: The object ID of the Contact, Lead, or User the email should be sent to.
* What Id: Optional, used for merge fields in the template.

If using a defined email body, the "Use Template" checkbox is unchecked and:

* TO: An array of up to 100 email addresses or object IDs.
* CC: An array of up to 25 carbon copy (CC) addresses or object IDs.
* BCC: An array of up to 25 blind carbon copy (BCC) addresses or object IDs.
* Email Subject: The subject of the email.
* Email Body: The body of the email.
* Set HTML Body: Determines if the Email Body should be read as plain text or HTML.
* Attachment List: Supports attachment IDs merged from Data JSON.
title: OmniScript Email Action
